aspects.name: Aspect of Zagreus
aspects.description:
The form in which the Twin Fists first revealed themselves.

The twin fists are bound to their bearer, but most fiercely to each other.

aspects.name: Aspect of Talos
aspects.description:
Your Special becomes Magnetic Cutter; its pull deals 20 damage.

They filled the bronze giant with power, conforming to its massive frame.
aspects.upgrade:
Magnetic Attack & Cast Bonus

(+10% / +20% / +30% / +40% / +50%)

Bonus lasts 6 seconds after Special

aspects.name: Aspect of Demeter
aspects.description:
After landing 12 strikes, your next Special* hits more times.

They were a natural fit; her power to bring life, their power to take it.

aspects.name: Aspect of Gilgamesh
aspects.description:
You have the Claws of Enkidu, whose Dash-Upper can Maim** foes.

The god-king inherited the furry-man's savage strength and stout heart.

upgrades.name: Breaching Cross
upgrades.description: Your Dash-Strike pierces foes and deals +900% damage to Armor

upgrades.name: Rolling Knuckle
upgrades.description: Your Dash-Strike deals +60% damage; added to Attack sequence.
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Heavy Knuckle
  • Performs the Dash-Strike in place without moving Zagreus. Allows chaining from one combo immediately to the next.

upgrades.name: Long Knuckle
upgrades.description: Your Attack has more range and deals +10% damage

upgrades.name: Draining Cutter
upgrades.description: Whenever your Special slays foes, restore 2% life

upgrades.name: Concentrated Knuckle
upgrades.description: Your Attack deals +5 base damage for each uninterrupted hit to a foe.
upgrades.notes: • Resets whenever a combo is broken, including after the final hit of a combo, meaning this lasts for a maximum of 5 attacks.

upgrades.name: Explosive Upper
upgrades.description: Your Dash-Upper deals +100% damage in an area

upgrades.name: Flying Cutter
upgrades.description: Hold Special for longer range and up to +100% base damage
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Aspect of Talos
  • Incompatible with Rush Kick or Kinetic Launcher

upgrades.name: Rush Kick
upgrades.description: Your Special becomes an advancing kick that also deals 40 base damage twice
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Aspect of Talos
  • Incompatible with Flying Cutter or Kinetic Launcher
  • Can cross gaps and low barriers when targeting enemies across them

upgrades.name: Quake Cutter
upgrades.description: After using your Special, deal 90 damage in an area where you land
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Kinetic Launcher
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Demeter
  • Damage is modified by increases to Special damage.

upgrades.name: Kinetic Launcher
upgrades.description: Your Special becomes a charged ranged attack that deals 50 base damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Rush Kick, Flying Cutter, Explosive Upper or Quake Cutter
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Gilgamesh or Aspect of Talos
  • Can Power Shot for additional damage

upgrades.name: Heavy Knuckle
upgrades.description: Your Attack becomes a slower 3-hit sequence, each deals 40 base damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Rolling Knuckle
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Gilgamesh

upgrades.name: Colossus Knuckle
upgrades.description: While using your Attack or Special, you are Sturdy

upgrades.name: Rending Claws
upgrades.description: Maim-afflicted foes take +25% damage and move 30% slower
